title: Value of the global eyewear market from 2018 to 2025
yAxis: Market value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: In general Market value in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Market value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2022 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2023 and 2024.
Maximum Market value in billion U.S. dollars, about 197.08 was reported at Year 2024
The lowest Market value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 172.13 was reported at Year 2022
